results.title: Tropical region
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “African Continent”
Shows geographic regions; population distribution, cultural influences, primary agricultural and natural resources, and emergence and development of the tropical region of Africa. Show four major regions: coastal lowlands, Congo Basin, Eastern Highlands, and Sudan, their climates, products and habitants, and the water power and mineral resources available but undeveloped.

results.title: Southern region
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “African Continent”.
Surveys southern Africa as a region of great wealth and potential. Gold and diamond fields; sheep ranches of the western uplands, and warm fruit lands of the eastern coast. Shows the people that immigration and migration have brought together - Bantu, Dutch, English and Asians; challenges in developing the region’s resources and in solving problems of emerging nationhood.

results.title: Northern region
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “African Continent”.
The interaction of the modern with the colourful and traditional characterises Northern Africa. This geographic region is greatly influenced by three factors: its primarily Arab background and culture, its age-old lack of water, and its long history of European influence. Shows oasis farming, craftsmanship, and modern industries and cities; and views some of the problems that face Moslems and Europeans.

results.title: Advanced Typing
results.media_note: Sorry, we don't have images or video for this item.

results.title: Duplicating and manuscript
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Advanced Typing”.
Demonstrates the correct methods of making masters for duplicating machine use, correcting mistakes on a stencil, the use of the illuminated drawing board for tracing lines, making hectograph masters, correcting mistakes when using hectograph ribbon, or carbon, use of electromatic hectograph machine, use of various types of duplicating machines, and typing manuscripts with footnotes. Centering on a typewriter improving characters or marks that do not appear on the keyboard, and reading proof readers’ marks are also explained.

results.title: Short Cuts
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Advanced Typing”.
Stresses the importance of having good posture and of having equipment and materials arranged for maximum efficiency. Demonstrates how to use tab stops, tab bar and decimal tabulator key. Shows the handling of carbon packs, use of the pressure indicator; correct method for making erasures, insertion of missing words and letters, removal of extra words and letters, typing cards, envelopes and labels, drawing vertical and horizontal lines.

results.title: The Field day
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Adults Learning”.
A teaching aid to promote group discussion on the problems of the adult learning process in the management-staff relations. Shows a gathering at a rural agricultural field day. The film seems to be pointing out that resistance to new ideas is hard to overcome.

results.title: The Billiard room
results.creator_credit: Peter Weir, Joe Scully, Australian Commonwealth Film Unit and Film Australia
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Adults Learning”.
Designed to promote group discussion on the problems of the adult learning process in management-staff relations through a discussion between a potential university dropout, his friend and an onlooker. It suggests that not all learning occurs in the classroom. This film should not be screened by itself as a documentary. It does not provide direct information on the process of adult learning. It is a teaching aid which provides a basis for discussion.
